name: s.to // Slim Night Design
description:
For "s.to" also known as "serienstream.to"

Slim Night Design.
Removed all useless content (like Sharing menus, like buttons, side navigation windows,...)
Recolored elements
Perfect for using fullscreen.

New style mode available: https://userstyles.org/styles/164343/s-to-tv-night-mode
additional_info:
v1.21 Design modifications

v1.20 Removed class "allSeriesBox".
Reason:
This box is useless.
If you have clicked 1 pixel away of the "Seen/unseen" button the "allSeriesBox" was triggered it redirects to the main page. This sucks and so I made the class invisible.

v1.14 Design modifications
v1.13 Autosize content container bug fix
v1.12 Recolored text elements for TV show list.
v1.11 Autosize content container to window size
v1.10 Fixed the start page

discussions.name: Awesome! It's optimized for ultrawide monitors :D
